column5: I had a few people ask to hear my acoustic version of Silent Night, so I threw a little video together the other night.  Thanks for all your kind comments on my other video...hope you enjoy this one as well.
Thats awesome!
cool song.  i do a fair bit of home recording myself.  what type of software/gear do you use?
Thanks Cliff !! Told you it was better....  Now I wonder if it gave me enough spirit to bash thru the mall today !! lol
Very nice Cliff!   Sitting here are work, while listening to you play and wishing I had some rum and egg nog.  That would get me in the spirit!  lol!

Thanks everyone!  I think I'm going to to a Christmas CD for next year...taking advanced orders now...LOL.    I use my band's PA...a Yamaha M810 for recording.  I will only use condenser microphones now (they are sooo much more sensitive and captures the highs and lows much better than a regular microphone) and you need a powered head to use them.  I record into that "vocal mic" you see in the picture.  I use the output on the PA straight into the computer.  I've tried a bunch of commercial software packages before to record, but I always go back to the one shown on the screen here...it's free...and downloadable on the net.  It's called Audacity.  Simple to use and has great results.
Nicely done Cliff Awesome work!!! Leechman
Very nice Cliff. Wish you would sing too.
Hey .. what happened     All I see is a box with nuttin' in it. After the last one ... I'd really like to see and hear this one too. Put the CD together ... I'd buy one.
Deadly!!!
Try this link Rich... http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9_NUX1_9-y0
Thanks Cliff. I was out in traffic this afternoon and I needed that.
Put me down for 5 copies (but I'd like them autographed)  Cliff I love listening to those! Thank you so much for sharing!
Much, much better.  Link works and great work from you .. as usual.
bump.. .for those that missed it.
Very Very nice-- thank you very much for sharing--- I will add this to my play list for tonight.. Merry  Merry Everyone-- i wish you all the best -- have a great, SAFE holiday.
Wow, sure beats my version of Silent night on an electric. That was amazing, Cliff!!
once again you have amazed us with your talent... Great job !!!!! and if you do the xmas cd i will take 3 that would make a great xmas gift for 2 of my friends.
Great Job Cliff!  Sounds great.
Cliff, that was beautiful. That is one of my favorite Christmas tunes. And you made it sound like it needs to be heard. Thank you for putting it on here for us.
Very nice bud,You are a national treasure for sure. Joe
